title: frontend_config_response
description: Response wrapper for frontend-safe configuration and optional server-side preference resolution metadata.

preference_resolution.description: Optional metadata describing how user/system preferences should be applied. `reduced_motion_effective` should reflect precedence: user preference (`ui.reduced_motion_mode` on/off) overrides system preference; `system` delegates to client system preference.

unsupported_client_behavior.description: Server guidance for unsupported clients. Expected default is to ignore unknown flags and fall back to baseline accessible behavior.
